title: Warm Ricotta with Honey
introduction: The success of this delightful dessert hinges on the quality of the ricotta. Be sure to choose the freshest available whole-milk ricotta for a smooth and flavorful experience. This warm, creamy dish is elevated with the natural sweetness of honey. For an extra touch, consider adding fresh fruits or a sprinkle of raisins with cinnamon.
instructions: Place the ricotta in a small bowl set over a smaller pan of simmering water. Heat until warm, about 10 minutes. Stir well.
Scoop the ricotta into serving dishes. Drizzle with the honey. Serve immediately.
variations: Try adding fresh fruit, or raisins with a pinch of cinnamon for a different flavor.
